name: Dinari RBLX
description: The Dinari RBLX dShares token (RBLX.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in Roblox Corporation (RBLX), a global leader in online gaming and virtual experiences. Roblox operates a digital platform where users can create, share, and monetize games and experiences in an expansive virtual environment. Each RBLX.d token is fully backed by a corresponding Roblox stock share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, RBLX.d enables 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity, making it easier for investors to gain exposure to the growing metaverse and gaming sector.
